trans-unit.source: Defines methods that decrypt an XrML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<encryptedGrant>" name="<encryptedGrant>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 定义解密 XrML 方法<xref uid="langword_csharp_<encryptedGrant>" name="<encryptedGrant>" href=""></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: Use the IRelDecryptor interface with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform> class to decrypt an XrML `<encryptedGrant>` element.
trans-unit.target: 使用 IRelDecryptor 接口<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform>类来解密 XrML`<encryptedGrant>`元素。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlLicenseTransform>

trans-unit.source: Decrypts an XrML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<encryptedGrant>" name="<encryptedGrant>" href=""></xref> element that is contained within a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.
trans-unit.target: 解密 XrML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<encryptedGrant>" name="<encryptedGrant>" href=""> </xref>中包含的元素<xref:System.IO.Stream>对象。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The Decrypt method decrypts an XrML `<encryptedGrant>` element and returns a plaintext stream.
trans-unit.target: 解密方法解密 XrML`<encryptedGrant>`元素并返回一个纯文本流。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod"></xref> object that encapsulates the algorithm used for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod"> </xref>封装 XML 加密所用的算法的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object that contains an asymmetric key to use for decryption.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"> </xref>对象，其中包含要用于解密的非对称密钥。

trans-unit.source: A stream object that contains an <xref uid="langword_csharp_<encryptedGrant>" name="<encryptedGrant>" href=""></xref> element to decrypt.
trans-unit.target: 包含的流对象<xref uid="langword_csharp_<encryptedGrant>" name="<encryptedGrant>" href=""></xref>元素进行解密。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> object that contains a decrypted <xref uid="langword_csharp_<encryptedGrant>" name="<encryptedGrant>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.IO.Stream>对象，其中包含已解密<xref uid="langword_csharp_<encryptedGrant>" name="<encryptedGrant>" href=""></xref>元素。</xref:System.IO.Stream>
